title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a credit against income tax for energy conservation expenditures in residences and for purchases of energy efficient appliances.
content: Energy Cost and Tax Relief Act- Amends the Internal Code to provide, for an individual, tax credits equal to 50 percent of: (1) the expenditures for qualified energy conservation property during a year. And (2) the expenditures for the purchase of any qualified appliance.
